data.title: Machine Learning – Advice from Experts – Clarity
data.text:
Looking for expert advice on Data, AI, GenAI, or Data Science? Or trying to understand or adopt LLMs like GPT4, ChatGPT, LLama, Dall-E or Midjourney? I would love to speak with you. I am a startup cofounder and CEO with 20+ years of experience helping businesses improve products and achieve growth using data science, AI, GenAI, and machine learning. I have used data science to solve problems in online marketing, e-commerce, SaaS, gaming, and other domains. I help individuals and businesses understand data science and develop a winning strategy using data and AI. Reviews from previous Clarity callers testify that they got more than they hoped for in topics related to business applications of Data Science, AI, GenAI, LLM, and Machine learning. If you schedule a call and are not satisfied at the end of the call, I will happily refund the full amount.

Andreas is a global expert in the field of Data, Digital Transformation, and the Future of Work • As Chief Scientist at Amazon, he worked with Jeff Bezos to develop Amazon’s data strategy • As Advisor, he worked with Angela Merkel on Digital Transformation and developing a digital mindset • As Data Coach, he helped Jack Ma understand how to best implement data-driven decision making to elevate Alibaba above its competitors “Andreas has been fundamental to driving the Digitalization of Lufthansa” - Christoph Franz, former CEO of Lufthansa Andreas is currently focused on helping organizations navigate the future of education, healthcare, and the workplace. He is also an advisor to multiple startups that he believes will play a key role in building a better future For speaking inquiries, please email speakers@caa.com

I am a consultant specializing in Machine Learning, Data Science, and AI. I offer over 10 years of very broad and hands on experience in a wide variety of industries. I am deeply passionate about with machine learning, data science, and AI algorithms, including growth hacking, recommender systems, and matching algorithms. I also run a boutique machine learning consultancy. We help companies understand and implement state-of-the-art, end-to-end machine learning solutions A typical starter engagement would be 100 hours of my time, 10 hours a week for 10 weeks, plus an experienced subcontractor to do some of the heavy coding.

I love to help organizations break through the barriers to applying AI and DI in practice. I've been doing this for decades, and have the scars and stories to help you. I have three CS degrees, two TEDx talks, an award-nominated book, and have appeared on CSPAN and NPR. I am recognized by the Women Innovators and Inventors Project. I've delivered machine learning for 30 years: to the Human Genome Project, the Department of Energy, the AO of the US Courts, the CBI, health care startups, NLP projects, and more.

I'm an entrepreneur and coder with experience in marketing (19y), data science (10y) and AI (1.5y). ------ I specialize in: 1. AI apps development (chatbots, content automation, decision making) My tech stack is: Python, OpenAI API (GPT-3.5, GPT-4), LangChain, Pinecone, Flask/Streamlit. 2. Prompt Engineering I've dedicated 800+ hours this year alone writing prompts and teaching it to others. ------ **AI is the new interface to knowledge and technology that makes us humans more productive. I'll teach you how to utilize AI to save time, money and other resources.** Some of my AI work: 1. An LLM app that collects, overviews and asnwers questions about AI news and other AI related content. The tool also creates social media content based on these overviews for me. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fDhtJ8PxLk 2. Prompt Engineering case-study: https://www.notion.so/valueto/Prompt-Engineering-Case-Study-collecting-categorising-and-repurposing-content-by-Tony-AI-Champ-43354a95777a49fb90e1f35c5385ca1d 3. Airi Onboardwell, an AI conversational chatbot. In this instance, Airi is trained on data about a social media role in the company named InsightWhale (that serve web3 clients) to help new employee on this role onboard faster and save InsighWhale 1 salary out of 6 that a company normally spend on onboarding a new employee. You can ask her questions about the role details. Airi is trained the way that if she doesn't know the answer, she will raise the question to the relevant person in the company, get an answer and memorise it so that next time a similar question emerges, she can answer it. https://aiemploy-ee-airi-onboardwell-flask-sg.onrender.com 4. My Udemy prompt engineering course with over 1700 students with an average rating of 4.5/5: https://www.udemy.com/course/chatgpt-for-data-science-and-data-analysis-in-python/

Ian Clarke is a Computer Scientist and Entrepreneur, with a track record of both technical and business innovation, and an outspoken thinker and activist on issues relating to freedom of speech, intellectual property law, and technology. Ian is best known as the founder and coordinator of the Freenet Project; designed to allow true freedom of communication, Freenet was the first decentralized anonymous peer-to-peer network, and a precursor of the “distributed hashtable” data structure. Ian has a degree in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Science and has over two decades of expertise applying machine learning to real world problems in areas as diverse as online dating, advertising, petroleum, and fraud detection.

Fractional CTO and Founder at Develomentor LLC. Founder, ex-CTO of Lucidworks. CTO of Wikimedia Foundation (e.g. Wikipedia) from 2019-2021. 20+ years in software engineering, natural language processing, search and machine learning. Published technical author with Manning Books. As a fractional CTO focused on the machine learning, search and NLP space, I focus on helping companies assess their technology and teams. I've spent all of my career in technology, first as a software engineer building complex applications in search, data science, machine learning and natural language processing and then as a founder, Board Member and CTO/VP of Engineering. Along the way, I have interacted with numerous customers from the engineer all the way up to the C-Suite. I am also the lead author of Taming Text, from Manning Publications, winner of the Dr. Dobb’s Journal 2013 Jolt Productivity Best Book Award.

I can help you in your search how AI can be implemented into your offering or product. This can be in the context of a new innovative product, or by smartly automating an existing product to improve results and/or save money. I do know about latest state-of-the-art AI possibilities (and I know how it works) and I guide companies with feasible innovation management. AI Software Entrepreneur, Harvard Business School, Founded Data Science Belgium (nonprofit AI community with 5000 data professionals) having organised hundreds of AI techTalks since 2014. Apologies if you don't receive my reaction despite your good intentions. I have been receiving much spam through Clarity. Please contact me via LinkedIn if I don't answer here.

I'm Chief Technology & Product Officer at Metamaven, a company which applied AI & machine learning to revenue growth. We help Fortune 500 companies and global brands deploy successful AI applications to consumers and enterprises. I recently published a book, Applied Artificial Intelligence: A Handbook For Business Leaders, which gives executives a foundational overview of enterprise AI: http://amzn.to/2rwOEcd You can watch an introductory preview of my talk "What Executives Need To Know About Artificial Intelligence" here: http://www.topbots.com/ai-education-intro You can also read my writing on applied AI for various industries, verticals, and functions at TOPBOTS.com, where I operate as Editor-In-Chief: http://www.topbots.com

Started and ran a successful small business. Work history in private equity and venture capital. These days I help clients make better decisions using the appropriate statistical tools. Interested in art, history of ideas, emotional intelligence, commercial/business history, 20th-century mathematics (AT, AG, DG, CT), literature, and history of science. I chose the Give Directly charity because it has a very low cost ratio. The founders also measure the outcome of their donations on the recipients as well as on a control group, providing solid evidence of the efficaciousness of their intervention. After what Bill Easterly called "a trillion wasted aid dollars" proving effectiveness couldn't be more important. If you think you know of a better charity or want to voice downsides of GiveDirectly, I'd like to hear from you.

I am the head of MLOps at TD Bank. I am responsible for ML model production system, infrastructure and MLOps frameworks. Previously my research has been published at some of the world's prestigious venues such as Nature Communications and has won multiple best paper awards including at the workshop track of the leading ML conference: Neural Information and Processing (NIPS). My research work has also been covered by several international media outlets and tech platforms including VICE's Motherboard (special feature presented by Audi), Investment Executive, Intel DZ etc. I also work very closely with people with other industries and has experience in consulting several leading MNCs.

Since 2012, I started advising advertising and marketing companies on developing optimization algorithms for ad buying. I designed Machine Learning algorithms for programmatic ad buying for several technology companies. My optimization algorithms used by companies in US, Canada, & Europe contributing to millions of dollars revenue annually for them. In 2014, I led developing a customized real-time bidder (i.e. RTB) for sophisticated media buyers such as mobile game companies and ad agencies. We developed a proprietary optimization algorithm for analyzing data to train models for optimal ad buying. As chief data scientist @Trulioo, my team worked in the area of fraud detection where we used machine learning algorithms and processed over 1.5 billion social profiles from Facebook, Twitter, Google+, & LinkedIn. Our predictive models computed authenticity score for people social profile to identify fraudulent accounts. While @SeekerSolutions, my team designed & implemented various NLP models for topic modeling and name entity recognition for free text in medical space.

I'm a web developer with a passion for art, design, coding, and human psychology. I believe that great web design is more than just making something look pretty. It's about creating an experience that is both visually appealing and functionally effective. I'm always looking for new ways to use technology to solve problems and make people's lives easier. In my spare time, I enjoy painting, drawing, and playing guitar. I'm also a big fan of reading and learning new things. I'm always looking for ways to expand my knowledge and grow as a web developer.
